com.boyuanitsm.fort.sdk

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.boyuanitsm.fort.sdk.ResourceManager

  • @Component
public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    fort resource cache. cache resource entity, nav, authority, role, group.
    Author:
    zhanghua on 5/17/16.

        public FortContext getFortContext(java.lang.String token)
